text: Sealant type (silicone, polyurethane, hybrid) approved as per submittals and joint function
Primer, bond breaker, and backer rod (if used) approved and compatible with substrates
Manufacturer batch numbers recorded and shelf life confirmed
Surfaces clean, dry, and free of oils, dust, laitance, or loose material
Joint dimensions match drawings/spec (depth:width ratios followed)
Proper use of backer rod or bond breaker tape to prevent three-sided adhesion
Ambient temperature and substrate within manufacturer’s recommended range
Sealant applied in continuous bead without voids or skips
Beads tooled neatly for smooth, concave finish and full contact
Adjacent surfaces protected from smears; excess removed before curing
Window perimeters (exterior/interior) sealed to air/vapor barrier
Control joints and expansion joints sealed per movement rating/spec
Visual inspection for continuity, adhesion, and finish
Adhesion test or mock-up pull test done (if required)
Manufacturer warranty or sealant certification submitted (if specified)

id: • ASTM C1193, ASTM C920 – Sealant Application & Performance
• Manufacturer Guidelines (e.g., Tremco, Sika, Dow Corning)
• LEED / Air Tightness Testing Requirements (if applicable)
